$description: Koda Product Help Knowledge Base - Complete UI/UX explanations for all screens and features

general.title: How to Log In
general.short: To log in, enter your email and password, then press **Log In**.
steps: Optionally enable **Remember me** to stay logged in
general.extra: If you cannot log in, check that your email is verified and your credentials are correct.

forgot_password.title: Recover Your Password
forgot_password.short: Use **Forgot Password** to start the recovery flow.
steps: Click **Forgot Password?** below the login button
Check your inbox for the 6-digit verification code
Enter the code on the recovery page
forgot_password.extra: The code expires in 10 minutes. If you don't receive it, check your spam folder or request a new code.

social_login.title: Social Login
social_login.short: You can sign in with Google, Facebook, or Apple.
social_login.details: Social logins bypass password entry and authenticate using the provider. Your account will be linked to the social provider automatically.
steps: Authorize Koda to access your basic profile

remember_me.title: Remember Me Feature
remember_me.short: Enable **Remember me** to stay logged in for 30 days.
remember_me.details: This keeps you logged in on this device. For security, we recommend disabling this on shared computers.

cases.explanation: Your credentials are incorrect. Double-check your email and password, or use **Forgot Password** to reset.
Koda temporarily locked your account for security. Wait 15 minutes or contact support.
You must verify your email before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification link.
Your account has been suspended. Contact support for assistance.
Check your internet connection and try again.

general.title: How to Create an Account
general.short: Fill in your details and create a secure password to get started.
steps: Accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
general.extra: After signup, check your email for a verification link.

email_requirements.title: Email Requirements
email_requirements.short: Use a valid email address that you can access.
email_requirements.details: We'll send a verification link to this email. Make sure it's correct and accessible.

password_rules.title: Password Requirements
password_rules.short: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
password_rules.extra: Use a unique password you don't use elsewhere.

confirm_password.title: Confirm Password
confirm_password.short: Re-enter your password to make sure it matches.
confirm_password.details: This prevents typos and ensures you remember your password.

terms.title: Terms and Privacy
terms.short: You must accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to continue.
terms.details: These documents explain how we handle your data and what you can expect from Koda.

social_signup.title: Sign Up with Social Accounts
social_signup.short: You can create an account using Google, Facebook, or Apple.
steps: Authorize Koda to access your basic profile
Your account will be created automatically
social_signup.extra: You can link multiple social accounts later in Settings.

cases.explanation: This email is already registered. Try logging in or use **Forgot Password**.
Your password doesn't meet security requirements. Make it stronger.
The password and confirmation don't match. Re-enter them carefully.
Enter a valid email address (e.g., user@example.com).
You must accept the Terms of Service to create an account.

general.title: Recover Your Account
general.short: Enter your email to receive a recovery code.
steps: Check your inbox for the 6-digit code
Enter the code on the next screen

code_not_received.title: Didn't Receive the Code?
code_not_received.short: Check your spam folder or request a new code.
steps: Wait 2-3 minutes for the email to arrive
Make sure you entered the correct email

code_expired.title: Code Expired
code_expired.details: Request a new code by clicking **Resend Code** on the recovery page.

general.title: Enter Verification Code
general.short: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
steps: Enter it in the verification field

code_format.title: Code Format
code_format.details: Example: 123456. Don't include spaces or special characters.

resend_code.title: Resend Code
resend_code.short: Click **Resend Code** if you didn't receive it.
resend_code.details: You can request a new code after 60 seconds. The old code will be invalidated.

general.title: Create a New Password
general.short: Choose a strong password that meets security requirements.

password_requirements.title: Password Requirements
password_requirements.short: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

general.title: How to Use Chat
general.short: Ask Koda questions about your documents in natural language.
steps: Type your question in the input field
Wait for Koda to process your question
general.extra: Be specific for better results. Example: 'What is the total value in the Q4 report?'

ask_questions.title: Asking Questions
ask_questions.short: Ask about your documents in natural language.
examples: What is the deadline mentioned in the Smith contract?
Summarize the key points from my meeting notes
Which document mentions the budget for 2024?
Compare the terms in contracts A and B
tips: Be specific about which document or topic
Ask one question at a time for clarity

citations.title: Understanding Citations
citations.short: Koda shows which documents were used to answer your question.
citations.details: Citations appear as numbered references [1], [2], etc. Click them to see the source document and exact location.
citations.extra: This helps you verify the information and explore further.

message_history.title: Message History
message_history.short: All your conversations are saved automatically.
message_history.details: Scroll up to see previous messages. You can continue any conversation or start a new one.
actions: Use the sidebar to switch between conversations

new_chat.title: Start a New Chat
new_chat.short: Click **New Chat** to start a fresh conversation.
new_chat.details: Your previous chats are saved in the sidebar. You can return to them anytime.

edit_message.title: Edit Your Message
edit_message.short: Hover over your message and click the edit icon.
edit_message.details: Editing regenerates the response based on your updated question.

regenerate.title: Regenerate Answer
regenerate.short: Click the regenerate icon to get a new response.
regenerate.details: Useful if the answer wasn't satisfactory or you want a different perspective.

copy_answer.title: Copy Answer
copy_answer.short: Click the copy icon to copy the answer to your clipboard.
copy_answer.details: You can paste it into other applications or documents.

feedback.title: Provide Feedback
feedback.short: Use the thumbs up/down buttons to rate answers.
feedback.details: Your feedback helps improve Koda's responses. You can optionally add a comment explaining why.

limitations.title: Chat Limitations
limitations.short: Koda can only answer questions about your uploaded documents.
limitations.details: Koda doesn't have access to the internet or external information. Upload relevant documents first.
examples: ✅ 'What does my contract say about termination?'

general.title: Document Library Overview
general.short: View, search, and manage all your uploaded documents.
features: Search documents by name or content
Filter by type, date, or folder
Sort by name, date, or size

search.title: Search Documents
search.short: Use the search bar to find documents by name or content.
search.details: Type keywords and press Enter. Results update in real-time.
tips: Use quotes for exact phrases: '"annual report"'

filters.title: Filter Documents
options: **File Type**: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text
**Date Range**: Today, This week, This month, Custom
filters.extra: Combine multiple filters for precise results.

sort.title: Sort Documents
sort.short: Click column headers to sort documents.

quick_stats.title: Document Stats
quick_stats.short: Each document card shows key information.

card_actions.title: Document Actions
card_actions.short: Hover over a document to see available actions.

processing_states.title: Processing States
processing_states.short: Documents go through several states after upload.

states.description: File is being transferred to the server
Extracting text and generating embeddings (2-4 seconds)

bulk_actions.title: Bulk Actions
bulk_actions.short: Select multiple documents to perform actions on all at once.

how_to_upload.title: How to Upload Documents
how_to_upload.short: Drag and drop files or click **Browse** to select them.
steps: Drag files into the upload area, or click **Browse**
how_to_upload.extra: You can upload multiple files at once.

supported_formats.title: Supported File Types
supported_formats.short: Koda supports PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and text files.
supported_formats.extra: Other formats are not supported yet.

limits.title: Upload Limits
limits.short: Each file can be up to 50 MB and 500 pages.
limits.extra: Split large documents if they exceed limits.

progress.title: Upload Progress
progress.short: Track upload and processing progress in real-time.
progress.details: Processing takes 2-4 seconds per document. You can close the modal and continue working.

folders.title: Upload to Folders
folders.short: Select a folder to organize your documents.
folders.details: Choose an existing folder or create a new one during upload. You can move documents later.

cases.explanation: The file exceeds 50 MB. Compress it or split into smaller files.
The document has more than 500 pages. Split it into smaller documents.
This file format isn't supported. Convert to PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or Text.
Network error or server issue. Try again.
Couldn't extract text. The file might be corrupted or encrypted.
You've reached your storage limit. Delete old files or upgrade your plan.

post_upload_actions.title: After Upload
post_upload_actions.short: Once processing completes, you can start asking questions.
actions: Go to **Chat** and ask about your documents

general.title: Understanding Upload Progress
general.short: Track the status of your uploads in real-time.
stages: **0-90%**: File is uploading to the server

close_modal.title: Close Progress Modal
close_modal.short: You can close the modal while uploads continue in the background.
close_modal.details: Processing continues even if you navigate away. Check the Documents page for final status.

cancel_upload.title: Cancel Upload
cancel_upload.short: Click the **X** button next to a file to cancel its upload.
cancel_upload.details: This stops the upload and removes the file. Already uploaded files won't be affected.

retry.title: Retry Failed Uploads
retry.short: Click **Retry** on failed uploads to try again.
retry.details: This re-uploads the file from the beginning.

general.title: Preview Documents
features: Navigate pages with arrow keys or buttons

navigation.title: Navigate Pages
navigation.short: Use arrow buttons or keyboard shortcuts to move between pages.

zoom.title: Zoom Controls
zoom.short: Adjust zoom level to read comfortably.

search_in_doc.title: Search Within Document
search_in_doc.short: Use Ctrl+F (Cmd+F on Mac) to search for text.
search_in_doc.details: Highlights all matches and lets you navigate between them.

download.title: Download Document
download.short: Click **Download** to save the file to your computer.
download.details: Downloads the original file in its original format.

print.title: Print Document
print.short: Click **Print** to open the print dialog.
print.details: You can print the entire document or selected pages.

general.title: Organize with Folders
general.short: Create folders to organize your documents.

create_folder.title: Create a Folder
create_folder.short: Click **New Folder** and enter a name.

move_documents.title: Move Documents to Folders
move_documents.short: Drag documents to folders or use the Move action.
methods: **Drag and drop**: Drag a document to a folder in the sidebar
**Move action**: Right-click document → Move → Select folder

rename_folder.title: Rename a Folder
steps: Right-click the folder in the sidebar

delete_folder.title: Delete a Folder
delete_folder.warning: Deleting a folder moves its documents to the root level. The documents are not deleted.

nested_folders.title: Nested Folders
nested_folders.short: Create folders inside other folders for better organization.
nested_folders.details: Drag a folder onto another folder to nest it. You can have unlimited nesting levels.

general.title: Account Settings
general.short: Manage your account information and preferences.

change_email.title: Change Email
steps: Verify the new email via the link sent to your inbox
change_email.warning: You'll need to verify the new email before it becomes active.

view_plan.title: View Your Plan
view_plan.short: See your current subscription and usage.
view_plan.details: Shows your plan name, storage used, documents uploaded, and renewal date.

upgrade_plan.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade_plan.short: Get more storage and features with a premium plan.

delete_account.title: Delete Your Account
delete_account.short: Permanently delete your account and all data.
delete_account.warning: This action is irreversible. All your documents, chats, and settings will be permanently deleted.

general.title: Profile Settings
general.short: Update your personal information and avatar.

change_avatar.title: Change Your Avatar
steps: Upload a new image (JPG, PNG, max 2MB)

general.title: Security Settings
general.short: Manage security features and active sessions.
features: **Active Sessions**: See where you're logged in

enable_2fa.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
enable_2fa.short: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
steps: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
Enter the 6-digit code from the app
Save your backup codes in a safe place
enable_2fa.extra: You'll need the authenticator app every time you log in.

disable_2fa.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable_2fa.short: Turn off 2FA if you no longer need it.
steps: Enter a 6-digit code from your authenticator app

active_sessions.title: Active Sessions
active_sessions.short: See all devices where you're currently logged in.
active_sessions.details: Shows device type, location, IP address, and last active time. You can log out of any session remotely.
actions: Click **Log Out** next to a session to end it
Click **Log Out All** to end all sessions except the current one

login_history.title: Login History
login_history.short: View recent login attempts to your account.
login_history.details: Shows successful and failed login attempts with timestamps, locations, and IP addresses.

general.title: Language Preferences
general.short: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

change_language.title: Change Language
change_language.extra: This only changes the UI language. Your documents and chats remain unchanged.

general.title: Storage Management
general.short: View your storage usage and manage space.
info: **Used**: Total storage used by your documents

view_usage.title: View Storage Usage
view_usage.short: See how much storage you're using.
view_usage.details: Shows a breakdown by file type (PDF, Word, Excel, etc.) and largest files.

free_up_space.title: Free Up Space
free_up_space.short: Delete old or unnecessary documents to free up storage.
tips: Sort documents by size to find large files
Remove old documents you no longer need

upgrade_storage.title: Upgrade Storage
upgrade_storage.short: Get more storage by upgrading your plan.
upgrade_storage.details: Go to **Settings** → **Account** → **Upgrade Plan** to see available options.
